title: PESSAT doubts
content:
Got some doubts 
1. Cutoff for each course in btech for RR campus 
2. the marks required for the cutoff rank
3. The important chapters in pcm for pessat 

Would be really nice to get these doubts cleared. Thanks you

comments.body: Cfbr
Cfbr
cfbr

1. Last year cutoff for cse rr was 1.2k aiml rr was 1.8k and cse ec was 3.3k donâ€™t really know cutoffs of other branches, also this year they have added cse aiml in ec campus as well so cutoff might go even lower for ec campus this year

Iâ€™ve got same doubt about marks required and imp chapters
Don't join this collegeðŸ’€

PES doesn't release questions papers or marks , they just release the ranks ,so there is no sure way of telling how many marks you need to get to clear cutoff  . The paper difficulty is surely less than jee and a notch higher than kcet . Subject distribution of questions is almost similar to your other exams like bitsat , manipal , kcet , comedk etc . 

Please join PES only if it's your last option .
kyun bhai

Why join PES if its the last option?
It's a good college right?
Is btech in Biotechnology good in PES?
immense workload, inefficient shitty management, under qualified faculty and entrance coaching like atmosphere would be the reasons ig

Too much study pressure,5 internals in one semester with one final sem exam, coaching institute type of culture,overall very unhealthy,one plus point is good placements if you're willing to sacrifice everything else

Check out other posts on this sub , there are many discussions on it .
To sum it up shitty management, overcrowded campus , tight schedule(5 internals with projects,assignments in almost every subject with no time to focus on extra stuff) , underqualified teachers with the experienced ones leaving every year , huge fees increase for pessat students etc .
Yeah this is like my backup
i am not able to get pessat test centre near my city what to do??
many facing that difficulty bro....nothing we can do
Heard it isn't
Do they have any history of rank manipulation like vit?

I wouldn't say exact manipulation , but I did observe (this is just my observation) people who chose less busy slots(like midweek morning slots) got better ranks than people who wrote on the last day (relative grading).
Ohh makes sense. Thank you
Is mechanical good? I am getting aiml in ec campus but I like mech
Haven't heard much about it. Also AIML is a new branch
